parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of IBM Cloud. When running on IBM Cloud, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of IBM Cloud. When running on IBM Cloud, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: iam_access_token
parameters.description: An IAM access token fully managed by the application. Responsibility falls on the application to refresh the token, either before it expires or reactively upon receiving a 401 from the service, as any requests made with an expired token will fail.

parameters.name: iam_apikey
parameters.description: An API key that can be used to request IAM tokens. If this API key is provided, the SDK will manage the token and handle the refreshing.

parameters.name: iam_url
parameters.description: An optional URL for the IAM service API. Defaults to 'https://iam.ng.bluemix.net/identity/token

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: The request headers

parameters.name: headers[X-Watson-Learning-Opt-Out]
parameters.description: opt-out of data collection

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: override default service base url

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the workspace.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the workspace. This string cannot contain carriage return, newline, or tab characters, and it must be no longer than 64 characters.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the workspace. This string cannot contain carriage return, newline, or tab characters, and it must be no longer than 128 characters.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the workspace.

parameters.name: intents
parameters.description: An array of objects defining the intents for the workspace.

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: An array of objects defining the entities for the workspace.

parameters.name: dialog_nodes
parameters.description: An array of objects defining the nodes in the workspace dialog.

parameters.name: counterexamples
parameters.description: An array of objects defining input examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Any metadata related to the workspace.

parameters.name: learning_opt_out
parameters.description: Whether training data from the workspace can be used by IBM for general service improvements. `true` indicates that workspace training data is not to be used.

parameters.name: append
parameters.description: Whether the new data is to be appended to the existing data in the workspace. If **append**=`false`, elements included in the new data completely replace the corresponding existing elements, including all subelements. For example, if the new data includes **entities** and **append**=`false`, all existing entities in the workspace are discarded and replaced with the new entities.    If **append**=`true`, existing elements are preserved, and the new elements are added. If any elements in the new data collide with existing elements, the update request fails.
